meaningMnemonic: My <kanji>righteousness</kanji> <kanji>task</kanji> is my <vocabulary>obligation</vocabulary> to these people. I will go out and purge the world of evil, be righteous, and make things happen. It's my <vocabulary>duty</vocabulary>!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
